extensionDescription.message: Provides options to activate the left tab on close and open new tabs to the right.

extensionDefaultTitle.description: Default title for the extension action button.

featuresToggle.description: Title for the feature toggles section.

activateLeftTabLabel.message: Activate left tab after closing current tab
activateLeftTabLabel.description: Label for the 'activate left tab' setting.

newTabRightLabel.message: Open new tabs to the right of the current tab
newTabRightLabel.description: Label for the 'new tab right' setting.
